description: Angular component 'MySubscriptionsComponent' that displays and manages a user's subscriptions, including fetching data from subscription and folio services, displaying in a table, and providing user interactions such as refresh and navigation.

classes.name: MySubscriptionsComponent
classes.description: Main component class managing user subscriptions display and interactions.

methods.name: ngOnInit
methods.description: Initializes component and loads subscription data.

methods.name: onSort
methods.description: Handles sorting of the subscription table based on a key.

methods.name: goExplore
methods.description: Navigates user to the explore page.

methods.name: load
methods.description: Fetches user's subscriptions and associated folios, then updates the component state.

methods.name: sort
methods.description: Sorts the rows array based on the current sort key.

ctags.name: g
ctags.pattern: /^      const g = globalThis as unknown as { location?: { href: string } };$/

ctags.name: k
ctags.pattern: /^    const k = this.sortKey as keyof (Subscription & { price?: number; folioTitle?: string });$/
